title.rendered: 6 Wine Delivery Companies That Ship Internationally

content.rendered:
Shiraz delivered to your doorstep is one way to warm your soul during isolation. Even if you don’t know the difference between Moscato and Chardonnay, you could impress your roommates with your wine knowledge! There are truly few joys in this world that match online wine delivery and wine companies that ship internationally!

Now that you’ve already tried our cocktail recipes at home, you might be looking for something new for the palette. With the added convenience of home delivery, you’ll be able to find those perfect food matches – from a crisp white for your carbonara to a sultry red to go with your steak.
We know you can’t wait to taste all the flavors of the grapevine, but Roomi recommends that you please drink responsibly!

Cult Wines – Solutions for Fine Wines

Whether you want to try your hand at fine wine investments. Or you just want a bottle to drink, you can buy wine from Cult Wines. No matter where you’re based, you can rest assured your vino will arrive at your door in perfect condition. This company works with freight forwarders that specialize in wine transportation with temperature-controlled delivery.

Heads up, though. This service is mostly geared toward the seasoned collector, or those feeling flush (or if you have something worth celebrating!)

Best of Wines – A Treasure of Fine Wines & Spirits

The wine specialists at Best of Wines boast over 30 years’ experience in their field. And they share their fascinating knowledge on the brand’s blog. So, even if you’re a bit of a newbie, you can get more insights into tones and tannins, and what the origin of each bottle means for its flavor.

Best of Wines can get your order to you in 1-4 working days, wherever you are in the world.

The Good Wine Shop – Good Wine, Real People, Great Stories

Starting as an independent wine merchant in West London, The Good Wine Shop has now been trading for almost 20 years. Their online wine delivery portfolio of wine features over 120 grape varieties. And has been taste-approved by the connoisseurs at The Good Wine Shop.

Actively working on reducing their impact on the climate and with more than a third of their portfolio being organic or vegan, this brand appeals to the environmentally-conscious wine lover. International shipping usually takes around 5-7 working days.

Berry Bros. & Rudd – Wine & Spirit Merchants

You can see instantly that this brand has gallons of history running through its veins. And in fact, Berry Bros. & Rudd is Britain’s oldest wine and spirit merchant. And has been trading from the same shop since 1698!)

With Four Masters of Wine on board, they’re well equipped to offer advice. Especially, when you’re trying to navigate the confusing world of reds, whites, and bubblies. You’ll be able to narrow down your search slightly by checking out their selection. They boast of benchmark bottles from around the world, then sit back and wait for your door-to-door delivery.

Drizly – Let The Drinks Come To You

If you’re based in the US and are really, really thirsty, then Drizly is the wine delivery company for you. With an impressive one-hour delivery window, impromptu dates and Zoom parties are no problem.

Unlike the others on this list, Drizly is an online wine delivery platform that doesn’t ship internationally. But it is the world’s largest alcohol marketplace. You can count on an extensive collection, competitive pricing, and a variety of local, well-known, and not-so-well-known products.

Amazon Wine Delivery!

Amazon now has its own wine department, which means you can search for new and much-loved bottles using the platform you’re familiar with. Search by the things that matter to you: price, country of origin, brand, or size – and check reviews before committing to a bottle.

This might seem like the most convenient online wine delivery platform. Unfortunately, Amazon Prime members don’t get free shipping on wine.

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find wine delivery companies that ship internationally? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match! Download the app here and hop on the easiest ride home, ever!
